knimeNode.name: HTETrigger
knimeNode.shortDescription: HTETrigger allows to set HTE options

fullDescription.intro: This node allows to set options for HTE (high throughput execution) of the nodes of a workflow. If HTE is used, nodes extending the abstract HTExectuerNode will be restarted several times when their execution has failed. This node is connected to the first node of the workflow via the Flow Variable Ports.
fullDescription.option: Check this box, if you like to use HTE.
Maximum number of times each node is restarted.
Check this box, if you like to set an individual threshold for each node in the workflow.
